column1: Gain skills that are at the center of value creation, from startups to global enterprises, and learn to devise and deliver new products and services through a no-nonsense, metrics-driven approach.View DetailsLearn innovation by doing itInnovation and entrepreneurial skills are a must-have for a successful new venture. They're also highly sought-after in existing organizations. Learn how to gain foresight into the future, apply design thinking techniques to explore unmet market needs, and devise business model canvas processes to quickly create viable businessesâ€”or pivot. This is a hands-on program that focuses on launching high-growth ventures by taking on real-world business challenges that are integrated into your entire program.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
